dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6647 IH: Halt Homelessness Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Thanedar introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To strengthen the United States Interagency Council on Homelessness.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Halt Homelessness Act of 2023.

section.header: Authorization of appropriations for Interagency Council on Homelessness

subsection.text: Title II of the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act (42 U.S.C. 11311 et seq.) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in section 208 (42 U.S.C. 11318), by striking to carry out this title $3,000,000 for fiscal year 2010 and such sums as may be necessary for fiscal years 2011 and inserting such sums as may be necessary to carry out this title;
by redesignating section 210 (42 U.S.C. 11320) as section 209.

subsection.text: The table of contents in section 101(b) of the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act (42 U.S.C. 11301 note) is amended by striking the items relating to sections 209 and 210 and inserting the following:
